name: Abraham G. WEEKS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Weeks v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Abraham G. WEEKS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 1st day of April, 2004, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
848 A.2d 924
Abraham G. WEEKS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 1, 2004.
